name: FNF Corrupt Sonic Test
description:
It's Sonic from Week "Sonic.exe" from Friday Night Funkin' Sonic Corrupted Generation! Credits do really go to P.R. and team for making the Friday Night Funkin' Sonic Corrupted Generation mod :) ! Play on the web here on a PC/Mobile devices! If you want, if you have a windows computer, you can also download it with the download button below!

Controls: 

To switch to touch control, touch the toggle in game.

Arrow keys to play the sounds (For mobile press D-pad button) 

Hold space and press any other arrow key for secondary sound (For mobile A Button and D-pad button)

Hope you enjoy :)

Hold any of the buttons to hold a pose!

Check out the Friday Night Funkin here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Also check out Friday Night Funkin on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

Check out the original Friday Night Funkin' Sonic Corrupted Generation mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/353806
